item.title: QoS Calculator
vSRX as a router
item.description: The SRX is a stateful firewall but I want to use the vSRX as a router for study. I intend to configure IPv6, MPLS and ISIS so a few changes need to be made. set security forwarding-options family inet6 mode packet-based set security forwarding-options family mpls mode packet-based set security forwarding-options family iso mode packet-based If the above wasn’t configured even with all the security configuration remove the stateful process of the firewall would drop traffic.
